text: Very good service. Great food for the price. Recommend the fried banana with ice cream.

Petit restaurant très chaleureux. Je suis un client régulier alors le service est toujours exceptionnel, mais dans la majeure partie du temps le service reste très bien. La qualité des plats pour le prix est plus que bonne! Chaque ami et collègue que j'ai amené ont tous adorés. 

Small cozy restaurant. I'm a regular customer, so the service is always exceptional, but most of the time the service is very good. The quality of food for the price is excellent! Every friend and colleague that I have brought all loved.

Really loved this place, 4.5 stars! 2 can dine for 22$ on certain days+ it's a bring your own wine restaurant. The staff is really nice, and efficient. The food taste awesome, I highly recommend their spring rolls. I would describe the place as a finer Chinese restaurant + they have sushi.
